_sText:
This is a collection of 15 maps both re-created, original and ports.
I do NOT own any of the following maps, but I am the sole porter of the files that are contained in the archive:
bhop_avantura_fixed - 15-30~ sec, medium strafe map
bhop_d3stiny_3 <15 second extremely short strafe map
bhop_darkstars >30 second non-strafe map, technical/routing
bhop_die <15 second short strafe map with a technical aspect that can be skipped
bhop_hb_cobrex <20 semi-short strafe map
bhop_m_snow_fixed <20 technical map with ladder
bhop_miojo <25s pure strafe map with surf
bhop_movementkrueppel <5 extremely short strafe map, similiar to freedompuppies
bhop_platinum_lol <1min very technical kz/bhop map with slopes, ladders, kz and technical turns
bhop_pro_bhop_1 <10s strafe map with technical climb end that can be skipped
bhop_purplehop <20s strafe map
bhop_quickbhop <20s general bhop map with technical climb end
bhop_rockshop_test <10s strafe map with climb end

bhop_floating_objects_remake is an original created by Acer. I never intended it to be played on most servers, nor did Acer probably, as it's an experimental map and not natively bhop, but can still be played like a bhop map.

Most of these maps were never uploaded due to either laziness, or just unwillingness to do so, but are all playable. Most maps contained wherein are short, <15 second maps, so keep that in mind before you dump them all onto your server if you dislike short, strafe maps.
Maps all ported or created by me, enjoy.

DISCLAIMER: If any of the original mappers has an issue with any of these maps being distributed freely to this website, contact me and I'll have the maps removed.
